lead_paragraph: In a Room for Debate forum last week, we asked several writers and the owner of the Strand book store which books they would weed out from their crowded bookshelves. And in the spirit of honoring books, we asked the writers to read passages from books they would never part with.
snippet: Room for Debate readers share their thoughts about the books they will never give up and why.
abstract: Room for Debate readers share their thoughts about the books they will never give up and why.
